snippet: Should Virginia pass a "Tim Tebow bill"?
abstract: Should Virginia pass a "Tim Tebow bill"?
lead_paragraph: Some home-schoolers are seeking to play on local high school teams, but some school officials have raised objections -- and the issue has become the subject of hotly contested state legislation in Virginia. What do you think?

headline.main: Should Home-Schoolers Be Allowed to Play Public School Sports?
